article_title: Get Covered Illinois Director of Outreach and Consumer Education Brian Gorman on how to plan your insurance with just one day left before the deadline
article_text:
× Get Covered Illinois Director of Outreach and Consumer Education Brian Gorman on how to plan your insurance with just one day left before the deadline

Matt talks to Brian Gorman, the director of outreach and consumer education at Get Covered Illinois about doing just that, with only one day left to do so. Gorman explains how the Affordable Care Act can make this easy to choose a plan before the deadline hits Sunday at midnight. Have you chosen your health insurance package yet?

article_metadata.description: Brian Gorman of Get Covered Illinois tells Matt what steps to take to sign up for health insurance before its February 15th deadline hits.
